sentences.english: Water-soluble carboxymethyl chitosan was prepared from dried shrimp shells.
sentences.chinese: 以蝦殼爲原料，製備了水溶性羧甲基殼聚糖。

sentences.english: Preferably the starting material is dissolved in methanol and a stoichiometric excess of ammonium hydroxide is added.
sentences.chinese: 原料最好溶解於甲醇並加入過量氫氧化銨。

sentences.english: Simply pour ingredients, add ice, stir, and enjoy!
sentences.chinese: 簡單的混合原料，加冰塊，攪合，享用。

sentences.english: The non-energy resources are not abundant in Britain, It mainly dependent on imports of industrial raw materials.
sentences.chinese: 英國的非能源資源不豐富，主要工業原料依賴進口。

sentences.english: Deordorizer distillates are one of main materials for tocopherol.
sentences.chinese: 油脂脫臭餾出物是生產天然生育酚的好原料。

sentences.english: The research aimed to study the preparation of activated carbon with Macadamia shell.
sentences.chinese: 研究以廢棄澳洲堅果殼爲原料的活性炭製備。

sentences.english: Tussah pupa oil was extracted from tussah pupa.
sentences.chinese: 以柞蠶蛹爲原料進行柞蠶蛹油提取的研究。

sentences.english: Pre-conditioner can make better products with high quality.
sentences.chinese: 可配置原料調質系統，使產品品質更佳。

sentences.english: Daqu spent grains and wheat bran were used as main raw materials to produce feed xylanase.
sentences.chinese: 以大麴丟糟和麥麩爲主要原料生產飼用木聚糖酶。

sentences.english: The air-jet yarn strength of these three kinds material has attained the anticipatory aim.
sentences.chinese: 上述三種原料噴氣紗的單紗強度均達到了預期的目標。

sentences.english: The research and application of pultrusion for continuous fiber reinforced thermoplastic composites;
sentences.chinese: 研究用陝西略陽玄武岩礦石原料生產連續纖維的工藝。

sentences.english: It selects top grade raw materials in the Land of Abundance, and is produced with our advanced techniques.
sentences.chinese: 精選天府之國優質原料，採用盈棚技術精工製作。

sentences.english: The humic acid resin was prepared using peat as material.
sentences.chinese: 利用泥炭爲原料製備腐殖酸樹脂。

sentences.english: Sanjiaodai rubber production, sales zinc oxide, magnesium oxide, and other chemical raw materials.
sentences.chinese: 生產橡膠三角帶，銷售氧化鋅，氧化鎂等化工原料。

sentences.english: A defatted pine-nut milk drink was developed from pine-nut.
sentences.chinese: 以脫脂松籽爲原料，開發研製了松籽乳飲料。

sentences.english: Shake and strain into a rocks glass, add 7up, stir.
sentences.chinese: 加冰搖合原料濾入冰過的玻璃杯，注入七喜，攪合。

definition: ingredients (in a cooking recipe)/to mix materials according to directions
prescription/cooking recipe/formulation/completing the square (to solve quadratic equation, math.)
source (of a product)/place of origin/manufacturing location
remnants of material from an industrial process/offcut/scraps
